mapper.select: SELECT b.nickname nickName, a.id homeUserId, a.home_id, a.is_main isMain FROM home_user a JOIN user_account b ON a.member_user_id = b.id where a.home_id = #{homeId} and a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.type != 11

SELECT b.home_name homeName, b.id homeId, a.id homeUserId, a.is_default_home isDefaultHome,a.is_main FROM home_user a JOIN home b ON a.home_id = b.id where a.member_user_id = #{userId} order by a.is_default_home desc
SELECT * FROM home_user WHERE user_id = #{userId} order by is_default_home desc limit 1
select ua.id from home_user hu inner JOIN user_account ua on hu.member_user_id=ua.id where hu.home_id=#{homeId} and ua.type in(0,1,11)
